@regressionPack @smokeTest Scenario: Test to add product to cart in ebay Home page and verify the details # src/test/resources/features/ebayUI.feature:5 Given Launch the ebay website # stepdefs.UIStepDef.launchApplication()
Title of Home Page is :Electronics, Cars, Fashion, Collectibles & More | eBay
And HomePage is displayed # stepdefs.UIStepDef.homepageIsDisplayed() When search for the "books" in ebay search bar # stepdefs.UIStepDef.searchForTheInEbaySearchBar(java.lang.String) And switch to the another tab # stepdefs.UIStepDef.switchToTheAnotherTab() java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException: Index 1 out of bounds for length 1 at java.base/jdk.internal.util.Preconditions.outOfBounds(Preconditions.java:64) at java.base/jdk.internal.util.Preconditions.outOfBoundsCheckIndex(Preconditions.java:70) at java.base/jdk.internal.util.Preconditions.checkIndex(Preconditions.java:248) at java.base/java.util.Objects.checkIndex(Objects.java:372) at java.base/java.util.ArrayList.get(ArrayList.java:459) at fisPages.UIActions.LoginPage.switchToTab(LoginPage.java:137) at stepdefs.UIStepDef.switchToTheAnotherTab(UIStepDef.java:140) at âœ½.switch to the another tab(file:///C:/Users/Vijay/Documents/assigments/FISUWAPI/src/test/resources/features/ebayUI.feature:9)
And click on the first "1" book in the list # stepdefs.UIStepDef.clickOnTheFirstBookInTheList(java.lang.String) And click on the "Add to cart" button on product page # stepdefs.UIStepDef.clickOnTheButtonOnProductPage(java.lang.String) Then cart is updated with product details # stepdefs.UIStepDef.cartIsUpdatedWithProductDetails()
